key.name: force-extension-values
key.summary: Whether or not to force using extension values; otherwise themes may overwrite it

key.name: screen-corners
key.summary: Whether or not to have rounded corners on the bottom of the screen and on other monitors

key.name: panel-corner-border-width
key.summary: Additionnal width used for the corner

key.name: panel-corner-background-color
key.summary: Background color of the panel, must be a CSS text-color

key.name: panel-corner-opacity
key.summary: Opacity of the corner when not in overview

key.name: debug
key.summary: Boolean, set to true to activate debug mode (more verbose journalctl logs)
